jira_mcp_troubleshooting.overview:
The project online Dev Env mode provides comprehensive Jira/Atlassian MCP troubleshooting.
CRITICAL: MCP servers MUST be configured per-project in .roo/mcp.json, NEVER globally.
See ../../sdlc/shared/jira-mcp-troubleshooting.md for: - Complete diagnostic workflows - Error pattern recognition - Platform-specific setup scripts - Docker/Podman configuration requirements - Validation and testing steps
jira_mcp_troubleshooting.documentation_reference: Leverage automated setup scripts and detailed documentation: - sdlc/atlassian/ATLASSIAN_MCP.md - sdlc/atlassian/ATLASSIAN_MCP_SETUP_SCRIPTS.md - sdlc/atlassian/setup-atlassian-mcp-linux.sh - sdlc/atlassian/setup-atlassian-mcp-windows.ps1
jira_mcp_troubleshooting.mode_behavior: Execute Jira MCP troubleshooting workflows from shared pattern file. Always check .roo/mcp.json (NEVER .vscode/settings.json).
